claim_card.claim: A continuity condition (‘Φ-Bridge’) is proposed linking quantum and gravitational regimes via equality of their coherence fluxes; when it holds, the system lies on a recursive isochrone where micro and macro coherence evolve at the same normalized rate.
claim_card.test_hook: Specify operational definitions of the two fluxes in an analogue platform (e.g., BEC horizon); test whether the equality condition corresponds to an identifiable plateau regime.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: RGPx postulates a single continuity condition — the Φ-Bridge — linking these domains
